name: Cascade
overview: A puzzle game published in Visionparty 2002, in GO64! 2002/12, and in Loadstar #232. Your task is to pop as many bubbles as you can. At least 2 neighboring bubbles of the same color are needed for this. The more bubbles you can destroy at once the more points you will get. If all the bubbles are destroyed you will get 500 extra points. Have much fun!
